subskills.DESCRIPTION: Sort pictures of living and non-living things found in a specific ecosystem (e.g., forest, pond)
Match different weather conditions to how they affect plants and animals in an ecosystem
Identify basic needs (food, water, shelter) of three common animals in a local ecosystem
Draw and label two ways plants help other living things in an ecosystem
Compare the day and night activities of three different animals in an ecosystem
Create a simple model showing how water moves through an ecosystem
Match seasonal changes to their effects on plant and animal behavior
Identify three ways humans can help protect a local ecosystem
Sort animals into groups based on what they eat (plants, other animals, both)
Demonstrate how different animals move through their ecosystem to find food
Match five different animals to their appropriate homes within an ecosystem
Create a simple diagram showing how two animals and two plants depend on each other
